name: Howard Sambol
what_you_do: Howard Sambol is the founder and director of the Life Crafting Program, where he guides people to clarify their purpose, passion, gifts and make money doing what they love.
who_you_serve: People in life transitions who want to create great income, freedom and personal fulfillment in their own business.
social_proof: Howard is an award winning author of Craft Your Genius Life and a Master Astrologer with over 30 years of experience.
signature_programs: Business Mastermind, Astrology, Cash Flow Freedom Course
business_focus: Guiding people to clarify their purpose, passion, unique genius and make money doing what they love.
